volumeInfo.subtitle: Synthesis and Characterization
volumeInfo.description: The demand for new materials with novel properties on the micro- and nano-scale continues to grow. This book provides an overview of state-of-the-art techniques for the synthesis and characterization of inorganic nanomaterials including techniques such as XPS, XAS, single crystal X-ray diffraction, X-ray microimaging, electron microscopy, and solid state NMR. Essential for all researchers in nanoscience.
volumeInfo.title: Inorganic Micro- and Nanomaterials
